name: Invaluable readings
body: # Readings ## Readings on Distributed Systems ### For Beginner * Notes on Distributed Systems for Young Bloods. * Paxos VS Raft * ### Consensus Algorithm #### Paxos #### Raft ### Tracing Infrastructure * Dapper, a Large-Scale Distributed Systems Tracing Infrastructure * Zipkin ### Papers * Dapper, a Large-Scale Distributed Systems Tracing Infrastructure * ### Pitfalls on Distributed Systems * Two General's Problem * Byzantine Fault Tolerance ## Readings on Software-Defined Networking ## Readings on NFV ## Readings on Database Systems * Why I love databases ### Principles #### CAP(Consistency, Availability, Partition Tolerance) * CAP FAQ * Please stop calling databases CP or AP
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
